title: Start
body:
<< if $alreadytalk is true >>
Potato
<< else >>
I'm looking for my loved one, did you see someone around here ?
[[ Yes ! |SawLovedOne]]
[[ No... |NotSeen]]
<< endif >>

title: SawLovedOne
body: Really ! Please take me to him/her !

title: NotSeen
body: When will our hearts meet again...
